title: An introduction to Sociological theory
description:
In this episode, Matthew talks through a basic introduction to what Sociological theory is, what is meant by structuralism vs Social action theory and what is meant by consensus vs conflict theory. Tu understand each of the major theories in more detail you should listen to the following -

Functionalism - https://www.spreaker.com/user/thesociologyshow/introtofunctionalism

Marxism - https://www.spreaker.com/user/thesociologyshow/introtomarxism

Feminism - https://www.spreaker.com/user/thesociologyshow/introtofem

Interactionism - https://www.spreaker.com/user/thesociologyshow/introtointerac

Post-modernism - https://www.spreaker.com/user/12291241/introtopostmod1
itunes:author: Matthew Wilkin
